text: E mmwe Ntume ﷺ! Chisimu Uwwe tunkundisye mmwejo achiŵammakwenu aŵala ŵamwapele mahari gao, kwisa soni (mateeka) gagapatile nkono wenu wakun’dyo, mwa agala (mateeka) gampele Allah, ni ŵanache ŵa achibaba ŵenu ŵaakulungwa kapena ŵanandi, ni ŵanache ŵa achibaba ŵenu ŵachikongwe, ni ŵanache ŵa n’jomba ŵenu, ni ŵanache ŵa achimama ŵenu ŵaakulungwa kapena ŵanandi aŵala ŵaasamile nomwe, ni jwankongwe jwakulupilila pati alipeleche nsyene kwa Ntume ﷺ, najuŵaga Ntume ﷺ jukusaka kunnomba –iŵele yakundisyidwa kukwenupe (mmwe Ntume ﷺ kunnomba mwangali kutola chilichose) – ngaŵa ku ŵakulupilila (ŵane). Pamasile patuimanyi yatwalamwile ŵanganyao pa achiŵammakwao kwisa soni (mateeka) gagapatile makono gao ga kun’dyo. (Tunkundisye yalakweyi mmwe Ntume ﷺ jikape) kuti pakaŵa pana chipaka chilichose kukwenu, sano Allah ni aŵele Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
